title: PSA: Don't queue up if you know theres a chance you will lag due to other occupants in your home.
body:
so tired of this every game.

 20(surrender)-40+ minutes pumping water out of a ship that will eventually sink.its tiring shit when its every fucking game.

if you have occupants in your house you know may hog bandwidth at any given time, don't fucking queue up, its just being selfish to the 4 other players who's time you waste.

these people feed out of control then just crutch the good ol " omgwtf is this lag" excuse.

disconnecting due to internet issues is not an excuse for an afk report, why should this be an excuse to get out of a feeding report.

replies.body:
I would like to take this opportunity to remind everyone that it is stated in the TOU and EULA that it is solely the players responsibility to ensure their computer/connection meet the requirements of the game, which also means you are responsible for ensuring you have the time to commit to a full game (in standard Summoner's Rift modes, that's up to an hour) and that you do everything in your power to ensure a stable connection during that time.

Basically, if you have someone in your house/residence that tends to hog the bandwidth, come to an agreement with them. Agree on times when they perform minimal online activities so you can play without interruption, and grant them the same courtesy.
I know how you feel i suffer like you do xD but its life

I had bad internet for ages, so I queued up for AI because it was less likely to affect the team heavily if I did drop or disconnected for ages. I still sated the addiction of LoL but didn't impact 9 people at once if everything went head over kettle.
ik how it feels, that's every norms game atm, cus these stupid retards wont surrender when its a lost game
